add_reward(address,address).details: The distributor will be in charge of seeding the gauge with rewards

params.distributor: Address of the distributor to set
params.reward_token: Address of the reward token to add

deposit_reward_token(address,uint256).details: In order to maintain consistent reward distributions the gauge should     be seeded with rewards at the end of every epoch (1 week)

params.amount: Amount of reward tokens to deposit
params.reward_token: The address of the reward token to deposit

params.index: Index of the reward token to get

returns._0: Address of the reward token at the given index

set_gauge_manager(address).details: This is a permissioned function that can only be called by the gauge manager or factory admin

params._gauge_manager: The address of the new gauge manager

add_reward(address,address).notice: Adds a reward token to the gauge and sets the distributor

deposit_reward_token(address,uint256).notice: Deposits reward tokens into the gauge

reward_tokens(uint256).notice: Get the reward token associated with a gauge at a given index
